job_history.work_description: Maintaining and reconciling inventory through clerical support, using PeopleSoft to procure and receive shipments obtained by purchase order. Create excel spread sheets for reports, manage inventory files and research inventory problems. Conduct inventory cycle counts, coordinate stock and document transactions. Provide Customer Service to Departmental and Fleet Maintenance Personnel, process work orders and fill Fleet Purchase Requisitions, contact vendors to procure fuel, parts and other automobile and truck supplies for fleet services.

Performance areas include: Interviewing prospective employees for higher. Providing daily instruction to warehouse personnel and dispatching drivers for deliveries and pickups. Routine cycle counts of inventory insure and verify, proper placement of inventory. Receive all incoming shipments and verify counts create stock locations. Maintain inventory and quality control procedures.
Line division supervisor assistant, plain captain while in line division. Worked as an aircraft hydraulic and structural systems mechanic as a member of Naval Aircraft Squadron VS-38.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in maintaining and reconciling inventory, conducting cycle counts, and managing inventory files, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised warehouse personnel, interviewed prospective employees, and provided daily instruction, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided customer service to departmental and fleet maintenance personnel, processing work orders and filling fleet purchase requisitions, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Used PeopleSoft to procure and receive shipments, and contacted vendors to procure fuel, parts, and other supplies, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Created Excel spreadsheets for reports, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Quality Control
skills.explanation: Maintained inventory and quality control procedures, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Logistics
skills.explanation: Coordinated stock, documented transactions, and dispatched drivers for deliveries and pickups, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Aircraft Maintenance
skills.explanation: Worked as an aircraft hydraulic and structural systems mechanic, but the extent of experience is unclear, suggesting some practical experience.
